title: The Most Unhinged MYSTERY TECH...
description: Lenticular Invisibility Shield on Amazon:  AYANEO Retro Mini PC:  Touch Me MIDI Controller on Amazon:  CRKD NEO S Controller on Amazon:  CRKD Nitro Deck for Nintendo Switch on Amazon:  Piano Gloves on Amazon:  Ombra Soundproof Mask:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  In this video, I unbox and test some of the weirdest gaming accessories you've probably never heard of. From piano gloves that turn your hands into instruments to a soundproof gaming mask, we dive into the good, the bad, and the downright bizarre. I even found a surprisingly decent Nintendo Switch grip that might actually be worth your money.  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 Invisibility Shield 2:35 Ayaneo Retro Mini PC 5:34 Touch Me 8:03 CRKD Neo S & Nitro Deck 11:32 Piano Gloves 14:27 Ombra Soundproof Mask
